function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Long-range aerosol transmission of infectious material","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread over large distances","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation systems, use of protective measures, and airflow management","Technologies":"Air purification systems, UV disinfection, and HEPA filters","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in crowded environments","Owner":"Government health agencies, building managers, and healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Dispersal of pathogens into the air over short distances","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within close proximity","Mitigation":"Use of face masks, proper ventilation, and spatial distancing measures","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation control systems, and personal protective equipment","People":"Individuals in close contact, healthcare workers, and individuals in shared spaces","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, public health organizations, and employers"},{"Description":"Effect of environmental factors on the movement and suspension of infectious droplets","Impact":"Unpredictable spread of infectious particles within healthcare facilities and crowded environments","Mitigation":"Optimization of airflow patterns, environmental monitoring, and use of air disinfection technology","Technologies":"Airflow simulation software, environmental monitoring devices, and air disinfection systems","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and visitors in healthcare facilities","Owner":"Facility management, infection control teams, and healthcare administrators"}]}
